abstract: A judge’s order in a bankruptcy case brings up the question of whether bondholders must get a “make whole” payment to get paid in full, Stephen J. Lubben explains in his latest In Debt column.
snippet: A judge’s order in a bankruptcy case brings up the question of whether bondholders must get a “make whole” payment to get paid in full, Stephen J. Lubben explains in his latest In Debt column.
lead_paragraph: A federal bankruptcy judge’s ruling in a closely watched corporate case seems to have made the distressed debt market a bit unhinged.

headline.main: Judge’s Ruling Could Affect Bondholders in Corporate Bankruptcies
